markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Famous](/Traits.aspx?ID=447)</title>

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 543

The Famous trait increases your Fame score when the structure is built. Some structures have both Famous and [Infamous](/Traits.aspx?ID=448) traits; in this case apply the one that matches your kingdom's preference (see [Fame and Infamy](/Rules.aspx?ID=1792)).
name: Famous
